landing_subtitle: This application provides access to several coaching bot characters with different perspectives and coaching styles. Users can create a 'life context' file to personalize conversations and update it with new insights after each session.
landing_dragDrop: Drag & drop your Life Context file here, or click to select
landing_createFile: Create a New Life Context File
landing_privacyText: If you continue as a guest, your data is processed locally in your browser. No data is stored on our servers. You are responsible for saving your file at the end of each session.
landing_error_invalidFile: Invalid file type. Please upload a .md file.
landing_error_emptyFile: The selected file is empty or could not be read.
auth_subtitle: Create an account to save your progress automatically, or continue as a guest and manage your data manually.
login_error_credentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
register_error_short_password: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
register_error_exists: An account with this email already exists.
forgotPassword_subtitle: Enter your email address and we'll initiate the reset process.
forgotPassword_success: If an account with this email exists, a password reset ticket has been created for an administrator to review.
contextChoice_subtitle: You have a saved Life Context. Would you like to continue with it or start fresh?
piiWarning_subtitle: The file you generated may contain Personally Identifiable Information (PII). Please review it and remove any sensitive data you are not comfortable sharing.
piiWarning_list:
Full names of real people
Email addresses, phone numbers, or physical addresses
Social security numbers or other government IDs
Financial account information
piiWarning_advice: It's best practice to use pseudonyms or general descriptions instead of real names or specific identifiers.
questionnaire_subtitle: Answer the following questions to generate a starting point for your conversations. You can skip any questions you're not comfortable with.
questionnaire_background_desc: Provide some general context about your life.
questionnaire_background_work_prompt: e.g., Senior Software Engineer at a tech company, focusing on AI development...
questionnaire_background_family_prompt: e.g., Married with two children, navigating work-life balance...
questionnaire_background_social_prompt: e.g., Enjoy hiking and playing guitar, trying to make more time for friends...
questionnaire_background_health_prompt: e.g., Generally good, trying to improve sleep and exercise habits...
questionnaire_background_sentiment_promp: e.g., Feeling optimistic but a bit overwhelmed with new responsibilities...
questionnaire_collapsible_prompt: Click to expand and add details about your {{type}}.
questionnaire_goals_2025_career_prompt: e.g., Get promoted to team lead...
questionnaire_goals_longterm_desc: What are your bigger, long-term aspirations?
questionnaire_goals_longterm_big5_prompt: e.g., Start my own business, travel the world, write a book...
questionnaire_routines_desc: What does your current system look like?
questionnaire_routines_focus_prompt: e.g., Use time-blocking, struggle with procrastination in the afternoon...
questionnaire_routines_learning_prompt: e.g., Read 1 book a month, listen to podcasts on my commute...
questionnaire_routines_ptm_prompt: e.g., Weekly review on Sundays, use a digital to-do list...
questionnaire_routines_health_prompt: e.g., Go to the gym 3 times a week, trying to meal prep...
questionnaire_challenges_career_prompt: e.g., Dealing with a difficult colleague, feeling stuck in my current role...
questionnaire_challenges_wlb_prompt: e.g., Working long hours, finding it hard to switch off...
questionnaire_challenges_social_prompt: e.g., A recurring argument with my partner, feeling distant from friends...
questionnaire_challenges_growth_prompt: e.g., Lack of motivation, fear of failure...
botSelection_subtitle: Each coach has a unique style. Choose one that resonates with your current needs.
botSelection_guestMessage: To unlock more coaches, please register for an account.
botSelection_registeredMessage: Unlock premium coaches by redeeming an upgrade code in the menu.
chat_welcome: Hello, I'm {{botName}}. What's on your mind today?
chat_error: I'm sorry, there was an error processing your request. Please try again.
chat_reportIssue: Report an issue with this response
analyzing_subtitle: Your coach is preparing your session summary.
sessionReview_subtitle: Here's a summary of your conversation. You can apply the proposed updates to your Life Context.
sessionReview_rating_prompt: How would you rate your conversation with {{botName}}?
sessionReview_feedback_prompt: Thank you. Could you share what could be improved?
sessionReview_xpBonus: You've earned an XP bonus for defining clear next steps!
sessionReview_blockages_subtitle: Based on PEP by Dr. Michael Bohne, your coach noticed patterns that might be hindering your progress. This is an experimental feature for beta testers.
sessionReview_no_blockages: No specific solution blockages were identified in this session.
sessionReview_preventSave_label: Do not save updates to my profile for this session.
sessionReview_preventSave_desc: Your progress will be added to the downloaded file, but your cloud-saved context will not be updated.
sessionReview_preventSave_continueDisabl: Saving is disabled. Please download your context file to save progress.
achievement_polymath_desc: Held a session with 3 different coaches.
userGuide_gettingStarted_p1: There are two ways to begin:
userGuide_gettingStarted_li1: **Create a new context file:** If you're new, the app will guide you through a questionnaire to create a 'Life Context' file. This file acts as your coach's memory.
userGuide_gettingStarted_li2: **Upload an existing file:** If you've used the app before, you can upload your previously saved `.md` file to continue where you left off.
userGuide_session_p1: Once you have a context, select a coach whose style matches your needs. During the conversation, be as open as you like. The more context you provide, the better your coach can assist you.
userGuide_session_p2: You can have a text-based chat or switch to Voice Mode for a spoken conversation.
userGuide_analysis_p1: When you end a session, the AI analyzes your conversation. It identifies new insights and proposes updates to your Life Context file.
userGuide_analysis_p2: You can review, accept, or reject these changes, and even edit the context manually before starting your next session.
userGuide_context_p1: This is a simple text file in Markdown format. Think of it as your personal journal that only you and your AI coach can see during a session. Keeping it updated helps your coach remember important details about your goals, challenges, and progress over time.
userGuide_gamification_p1: The app includes levels, streaks, and achievements to motivate you on your journey of self-reflection. The more you engage, the more you unlock.
userGuide_privacy_p1:
For registered users, we use **end-to-end encryption** for your `Life Context` file. Your password is used to create an encryption key on your device. This key is never sent to our servers. Your `Life Context` is encrypted before it's saved and can only be decrypted on your device when you log in. This means no one, not even administrators, can read your private data.

IMPORTANT: Because of this high security, if you forget your password and an administrator has to reset it, your encrypted `Life Context` file will be **permanently and irretrievably lost**.
formatting_p1: You can use basic Markdown to structure your Life Context file. This helps the AI understand the document's hierarchy.
formatting_headings_p1: Use hashtags to create main sections and subsections.
formatting_bold_p1: A common pattern is to use bold text for a key, followed by a colon.
formatting_lists_p1: Use asterisks or dashes for bullet points.
formatting_manual_p1: You can always edit the final context manually on the Session Review screen before saving or downloading.
formatting_manual_p2: A well-structured document leads to better coaching insights.
faq_q1_a: Yes. If you use Guest Mode, all data is processed in your browser and is never stored on a server. If you register an account, your Life Context is end-to-end encrypted. You are always in control.
faq_q2_q: Why do I need a 'Life Context' file?
faq_q2_a: Large Language Models are stateless, meaning they don't remember past conversations. The Life Context file provides this memory, allowing for deep, continuous coaching sessions over time.
faq_q3_q: Can I use the app without a file?
faq_q3_a: Yes, you can start a session with an empty context by using the 'Create a New Life Context File' option and leaving the questionnaire blank. The conversation will be less personalized, but still functional.
faq_q4_a: Your conversation is sent to a powerful AI model for analysis. It summarizes new insights and suggests how to update your Life Context file based on the discussion.
faq_q5_q: Why is Voice Mode not working or the voice quality poor?
faq_q5_a: Voice Mode relies on your browser's built-in Web Speech API. Support and quality can vary significantly:
faq_q5_a_li1: **Browser:** Chrome and Edge generally have the best support. Firefox and Safari may have limitations or fewer high-quality voices.
faq_q5_a_li2: **Operating System:** Your OS provides the voices. Some operating systems offer 'premium' or 'enhanced' voices that you may need to download in your system's settings.
faq_q5_a_footer: For the best experience, we recommend using a modern Chromium-based browser (like Chrome or Edge) on a desktop operating system.
faq_q6_q: What is the gamification system for?
faq_q6_a: The levels, streaks, and achievements are designed as a light-hearted way to encourage regular self-reflection, which is key to personal growth.
about_p1: Meaningful Conversations is a tool designed to bridge the gap between the power of large language models and the need for personalized, continuous self-improvement.
about_mission_p1: Our mission is to provide an accessible, private, and effective tool for self-reflection and personal growth. We believe that structured conversation with a focused AI can unlock profound insights.
about_howitworks_p1: The application combines a user-managed 'Life Context' file with the advanced reasoning capabilities of Google's Gemini models. This allows the AI to act as a coach with long-term memory, helping you track goals, understand challenges, and reflect on your progress over time.
disclaimer_p1: This application and the AI coaches within it are provided for informational and educational purposes only.
disclaimer_professional_title: Not a Substitute for Professional Advice
disclaimer_professional_p1: The AI coaches are not licensed medical, legal, financial, or therapeutic professionals. The conversations you have are not a substitute for advice from a qualified professional. If you are in crisis, please contact a local emergency service.
disclaimer_guarantees_p1: We make no guarantees about the accuracy, reliability, or effectiveness of the advice or insights provided by the AI coaches. Your use of this application is at your own risk.
disclaimer_delete_warning: Deleting your account is a permanent action and cannot be undone. All your data, including your encrypted Life Context and progress, will be irretrievably erased.
terms_p1: By using this application, you agree to these terms.
terms_conduct_p1: You agree not to use this service for any unlawful purpose or to harass, abuse, or harm another person.
terms_availability_p1: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue the service at any time without notice.
terms_liability_p1: In no event shall the creators of this application be liable for any damages arising from the use of this service.

redeem_error_invalid: The code is invalid, has expired, or has already been used.

admin_reset_confirm_part1: Are you sure you want to reset the password for
admin_reset_confirm_warning_title: CRITICAL WARNING: DATA LOSS WILL OCCUR
admin_reset_confirm_warning_desc: This user's Life Context is end-to-end encrypted. Resetting their password will make their existing data permanently unreadable. Their Life Context file will be wiped. This action cannot be undone.
changePassword_error_short: New password must be at least 6 characters long.
changePassword_error_generic: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
deleteAccount_warning: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All of your data, including your profile and progress, will be permanently deleted.
deleteAccount_confirmation: To confirm, please type the following text into the box below: {{requiredText}}
deleteAccount_error_mismatch: The confirmation text does not match.
deleteAccount_error_api: There was an error deleting your account. Please try again.
voiceModal_auto_desc: The app will choose the best voice for the coach and language.
voiceModal_preview_text: Hello, this is a preview of my voice.
voiceModal_noVoices: No local {{gender}} voices for {{language}} were found on your system.
voiceModal_noVoices_advice: You may need to install them in your operating system's settings.
feedback_description: Thank you for helping improve the conversation quality. Please provide details about what went wrong.
feedback_commentsPlaceholder: e.g., The response was repetitive, irrelevant, or factually incorrect...
feedback_successMessage: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate you helping us improve.
blockageScore_subtitle: This score indicates the potential presence of recurring thought patterns that may be hindering progress. A lower score is better.
